name: International Congress on Clinical Immunology and Allergy
content: Magnus Group is pleased to extend a warm invitation to join its prestigious event “International Conference on Clinical Immunology and Allergy” (ICIA 2022), which can be attended virtually during October 19-20, 2022\. The congress will emphasize the theme "Discovering new insights for an Allergy-free life". There's never been a more critical time for the immunology and allergy community to come together and exchange cutting-edge research. Our mission is to improve the quality of immunology education and research by facilitating scientific interactions between laboratories and researchers around the world. The global Allergy summit will bring together researchers, scientists, academicians, immunologists, clinicians, allergy experts, healthcare professionals, surgeons, nurses and individuals interested in immunology and allergy associated fields. The scientific gathering will try to establish itself as a leading distinguished event in the field of immunology and allergy by offering a diverse and stimulating program across two-days having keynote sessions, plenary talks, oral and poster presentations on the state-of-the-art advancements, trends and innovations in the aforementioned field. Come learn, grow, and network with prominent leaders virtually. At ICIA 2022 we'll go through the most up-to-date research and novel innovations, as well as the latest therapeutic strategies and diagnostic tools in the field of Immunology and Allergy.
